original_text: The seven angels with the seven terrible troubles then came out of God's house. They were wearing clean, bright clothes that were made from linen. They had gold belts around the top part of their bodies.
korean_text: 일곱 재앙을 가진 일곱 천사가 성전으로부터 나와 맑고 빛난 세마포 옷을 입고 가슴에 금 띠를 띠고

sentences.original_text: The seven angels with the seven terrible troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 가지 무서운 재앙을 가진 일곱 천사들이

sentences.original_text: then came out of God's house
They were wearing clean, bright clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 깨끗하고 밝은 옷을 입고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: around the top part of their bodies
